welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kamagaya, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, delicious street food, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Kamagaya has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mamma Pasta (マンマパスタ)
restaurants.description: Mamma Pasta (マンマパスタ) is a italian restaurant located in 鎌ヶ谷市.
restaurants.address: 新鎌ケ谷2-5-24, 鎌ヶ谷市, 千葉県

restaurants.name: Yamaokaya (ラーメン山岡家)
restaurants.description: Yamaokaya (ラーメン山岡家) is a ramen restaurant located in 鎌ケ谷市.
restaurants.address: 新鎌ケ谷3-3-6, 鎌ケ谷市, 千葉県, 273-0107

restaurants.name: West (ウエスト)
restaurants.description: West (ウエスト) is a udon restaurant located in 鎌ケ谷市.
restaurants.address: 道野辺本町1-2-16, 鎌ケ谷市, 千葉県, 273-0137

restaurants.name: Peaterpan (ピーターパン 小麦の郷店)
restaurants.description: Peaterpan (ピーターパン 小麦の郷店) is a bakery located in 鎌ケ谷市.

restaurants.name: 坂井精肉店 松戸元山店
restaurants.description: 坂井精肉店 松戸元山店 is a tonkatsu restaurant located in 松戸市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of amenities, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for international flights, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 3 hours per day by registering with a valid email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and main terminal of Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by registering with a valid email address.
